sentences.en: a highly controversial issue
sentences.cn: 有很大争议的问题

sentences.en: a highly desirable neighborhood
sentences.cn: 宜居的街区

sentences.en: a highly developed economy
sentences.cn: 高度发达的经济

sentences.en: He is highly respected for his novels and plays.
sentences.cn: 他的小说和剧本使他非常受人敬重。

sentences.en: He is more highly educated, with a PhD in Chemistry.
sentences.cn: 他受过更高的教育，拥有化学博士学位。

sentences.en: highly competitive industries
sentences.cn: 竞争非常激烈的行业

sentences.en: Human perception is highly imperfect and by definition subjective.
sentences.cn: 人的感知具有高度缺陷，而且天性主观。

sentences.en: I gather his report is highly critical of the trial judge.
sentences.cn: 据我所知，他在报道中毫不留情地批评了初审法官。

sentences.en: I'm highly unsympathetic to what you are trying to achieve.
sentences.cn: 我极不赞成你试图达成的目标。

sentences.en: I've just seen a play that I can highly recommend.
sentences.cn: 我刚看了一场话剧，我强烈推荐。

sentences.en: It is difficult to praise this immaculately researched work too highly.
sentences.cn: 这项研究工作毫无瑕疵，怎样称赞都不过分。

sentences.en: It was highly unlikely that their paths would cross again.
sentences.cn: 他们再次偶遇的可能性非常小。

sentences.en: Ozone is a highly reactive form of oxygen gas.
sentences.cn: 臭氧是一种非常活跃的氧气形态。

sentences.en: People at the club think very highly of him.
sentences.cn: 俱乐部的人很佩服他。

sentences.en: Such measures would be highly impracticable and almost impossible to apply.
sentences.cn: 这样的措施非常不切实际，几乎不可能付诸实施。

sentences.en: T.S. Eliot’s highly influential poem, ‘The Waste Land’ T.S.
sentences.cn: 艾略特极有影响力的诗作《荒原》

sentences.en: The French are proud and highly xenophobic when it comes to cooking.
sentences.cn: 谈到烹饪，法国人会颇为得意并且极端排斥外国菜。

sentences.en: Their healthy image disguises the fact that they are highly processed foods.
sentences.cn: 它们看上去有益健康，实则掩盖了其为精加工食品这一事实。

sentences.en: Though ten years old, this book is highly recommended.
sentences.cn: 尽管是10年前出版的，这本书仍值得大力推荐。

sentences.en: Tom’s mother was highly critical of the school’s approach.
sentences.cn: 汤姆的母亲对学校的处理方法持强烈的批评态度。

sentences.en: Why were spices so highly valued in late 15th-century Europe?
sentences.cn: 为什么香料在15世纪末期的欧洲如此贵重？

words.tran_cn: 高的；高级的；崇高的；高音调的
高水平；天空；由麻醉品引起的快感；高压地带
提高；增高；加强；使更显著
高度地；非常；非常赞许地

trans.tran_cn: 高度地，极，非常，非常赞许地
